examples: Clashes broke out between police and demonstrators.
Estallaron enfrentamientos entre la policía y los manifestantes.
Eight people were wounded in a clash with border guards.
Ocho personas resultaron heridas en un enfrentamiento con los guardias fronterizos.
Several people were injured in violent clashes with the police.
Varias personas resultaron heridas en violentos enfrentamientos con la policía.
There has been a head-on clash between the two candidates over education policy.
Ha habido un enfrentamiento frontal entre los dos candidatos por la política educativa.
